acceptance-test-run.title: Checking that the number of base trips are correct
acceptance-test-run.name: Checking that the number of base trips are correct

user-story.name: O t r by time period

tag.name: O t r by time period

test-group.name: [1] {month=Jan-13, data_domain=8896, contract=1, hour=0, scheduled=56, untracked=43, departed=13, gt30min=0, base=13, late=1, early=0, ontime=12, ontimepct=92.31%, latepct=7.69%, earlypct=0.00%}

test-step.description: Given the month is {Jan-13} and contract is {1} and the operator's domain is {8896}
And there are {56} scheduled trips for hour {0}
When we check the hourly OTR
Then the number of trips used for OTR calculations should be {12} on-time trips
And the base number of trips ({13}) is the departed trips ({13}) less exceptional trips ({0})
